title: Crisis intervention. Pt. 4: Boy-girl relationships
brief_description: An open-ended film which presents a crisis intervention telephone conversation between a hotline listener and a fifteen-year-old girl who is considering using sex to keep her boyfriend. Suitable for secondary school level.
